Uses of Package
com.mygdx.game

  • Packages that use com.mygdx.game 
    Package Description
    com.mygdx.game
    Contains core classes for the game.
    com.mygdx.game.battle
    Contains classes relating to the battle system.
    com.mygdx.game.entity
    Contains classes relating to characters in the game overworld.
    com.mygdx.game.ui
    Contains classes relating to the in-game user interface.
  • Classes in com.mygdx.game used by com.mygdx.game 
    Class and Description
    Agent
    Represents a party member or an enemy in battle.
    Agent.AgentType
    Represents the type of agent (either friendly or enemy).
    Consumable
    Represents a consumable item.
    Consumable.ConsumeType
    Represents which type of effect a consumable item has.
    CurrentEquipment
    Represents the equipment that an agent currently has equipped.
    CurrentEquipment.Slot
    Represents the slot in which a piece of equipment can be equipped.
    Equipment
    Represents an item of equipment.
    Equipment.EquipType
    Represents each different type of equipment.
    Game
    The core game class.
    GameWorld
    Contains the logic for exploring the game world and triggering encounters.
    GameWorld.GameState
    Represents the current state of the game.
    InputHandler.InputType
    Represents a type of input.
    ItemManager
    Contains every item accessible in the game.
    JsonLoader
    Responsible for loading JSON files.
    Level
    The level class contains the map used by the game and stores all characters.
    PartyManager
    Contains information about a party of agents.
    Shop
    Represents a shop in the game with a stock of consumable and equipment items.
    ShopManager
    Stores all of the shops accessible in the game.
    Skill
    Represents a skill usable by agents in battle.
    Skill.SkillType
    Represents the type of a skill.
    SkillManager
    Stores all of the skills usable in the game.
    Statistics
    Represents the statistics of an agent.
    UseAbility
    Represents an ability that can be used in battle.
    WorldRenderer
    Responsible for rendering the game world.
    WorldScreen
    A screen which displays the game world.
  • Classes in com.mygdx.game used by com.mygdx.game.battle 
    Class and Description
    Agent
    Represents a party member or an enemy in battle.
    Agent.AgentType
    Represents the type of agent (either friendly or enemy).
    Game
    The core game class.
    InputHandler.InputType
    Represents a type of input.
    PartyManager

    UseAbility
    Represents an ability that can be used in battle.
  • Classes in com.mygdx.game used by com.mygdx.game.entity 
    Class and Description
    GameWorld
    Contains the logic for exploring the game world and triggering encounters.

    The level class contains the map used by the game and stores all characters.
  • Classes in com.mygdx.game used by com.mygdx.game.ui 
    Class and Description
